title: Ukuvikela Iplanethi Yethu
subtitle: Ukulondolozwa Kwemvelo
description: Ukusebenzisa izindlela ezisimeme kanye nemizamo yokulondolozwa ukuze kugcinwe imvelo yezizukulwane ezizayo kuyilapho kunika imiphakathi yasendaweni amandla.

title: Ezempilo Zabo Bonke
subtitle: Inhlalakahle Yomphakathi
description: Ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezempilo ezibalulekile kanye nemfundo yezempilo emiphakathini engakasekelwa, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu unokufinyelela ekunakekelweni kwezempilo okusezingeni eliphezulu.
title: Umthelela Wethu Okhulayo

stories.title: Izindaba Zomthelela Wethu
stories.subtitle: Thola ukuthi sidala kanjani ushintsho oluhlala njalo emiphakathini yonke emhlabeni

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukutshala Imbewu Yoshintsho?
cta.subtitle: Joyina umphakathi wethu okhulayo wabashintshi futhi usisize sikhulise ithemba emiphakathini edinga kakhulu. Wonke umnikelo, noma ngabe mncane kangakanani, udala amagagasi oshintsho oluhle.

hero.subtitle: Njengesihlahla se-baobab esinamandla, sikholelwa ezimpandeni ezijulile, ukukhula okuqinile, kanye nomthelela ohlala njalo.

mission.title: Umsebenzi Wethu
mission.text: Ukunakekela ukukhula okusimeme emiphakathini ngemfundo, ukunika amandla, kanye nokunakekelwa kwemvelo, ukudala ushintsho oluhle oluhlala njalo oluthinta izizukulwane.
mission.description: Kusukela sasekelwa ngo-2020, sizibophezele ekudaleni izixazululo ezisimeme ezibhekana nezimbangela eziyisisekelo zobumpofu, ukungalingani, kanye nokucekelwa phansi kwemvelo.

values.title: Izindinganiso Zethu Eziyisisekelo
values.subtitle: Izindinganiso zethu eziyisisekelo ziqondisa zonke izinqumo esizenzayo kanye nazo zonke izenzo esizenzayo enkonzweni yomsebenzi wethu.
values.growthDescription: Sikholelwa ekunakekeleni izixazululo zesikhathi eside, ezisimeme ezikhula zibe namandla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengesihlahla se-baobab.
values.communityDescription: Imiphakathi isenhliziyweni yakho konke esikwenzayo. Siphulaphula, sifunda, futhi sisebenza ndawonye ukuze sidale ushintsho olunengqondo.
values.transparencyDescription: Sigcina ukungafihli lutho okuphelele emisebenzini yethu, ezezimali, kanye nomthelela wethu ukuze sakhe ukwethembana okuhlala njalo nabasekeli bethu.
values.empowermentDescription: Sinika abantu ngabanye nemiphakathi amandla ngamathuluzi, ulwazi, kanye nezinsiza abazidingayo ukuze baphumelele ngokuzimela.

timeline.title: Sikhula Ndawonye Kusukela Ngo-2020
timeline.subtitle: Kusukela ekuqaleni okunokuthobeka kuya emthelela womhlaba wonke, bona ukuthi i-BAOBAB HOPE ikhule kanjani futhi yashintsha kanjani.

milestone1.description: Yaqala ngombono wokudala ushintsho oluhlala njalo

milestone2.description: Yethula izinhlelo zokufunda nokubhala emiphakathini emi-3

milestone3.description: Yandiswa ukuze ifake amaphrojekthi okulondolozwa nokusimama

milestone4.description: Yethula imitholampilo yezempilo ehambayo kanye nemfundo yezempilo

milestone5.description: Manje isebenza emazweni ayi-18 ezwekazini ezine

impact.title: Umthelela Wethu Okhulayo
impact.subtitle: Izinombolo ezixoxa indaba yezimpilo eziguquliwe nemiphakathi enikezwe amandla.

team.title: Abantu Abangemuva Komsebenzi
team.subtitle: Hlangana nabantu abazinikele abahola inhlangano yethu futhi baqhuba umsebenzi wethu phambili.

member2.name: UJean-Baptiste Dubois
member2.bio: Uchwepheshe wezemfundo ogxile ezinhlelweni zokufunda eziqhutshwa ngumphakathi

member3.name: USarah Chen
member3.bio: Umphathi wezempilo othanda ukunakekelwa kwezempilo okufinyeleleka kalula

history.title: Umlando Wethu
history.subtitle: Uhambo lwe-BAOBAB HOPE kusukela embonweni omncane kuya enhlanganweni yomhlaba wonke

founding.title: Ukuqala Kwethemba
founding.description: I-BAOBAB HOPE yasungulwa ngo-2020 ngombono olula kodwa onamandla: ukudala ushintsho oluhlala njalo emiphakathini yonke emhlabeni.

growth.title: Ukukhula Kwezimpande
growth.description: Kusukela ekuqaleni kwethu okunokuthobeka, sikhule ukuze sikhonze imiphakathi emazweni ayi-18, sihlala sihlala sithembekile ezindinganisweni zethu eziyisisekelo.

impact.title: Ukwenza Umthelela
impact.description: Namuhla, siguqule izimpilo ezingaphezu kuka-75,000 ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zethu zemfundo, ezempilo, kanye nezokongiwa kwemvelo.

cta.title: Yiba Ingxenye Yendaba Yethu
cta.subtitle: Joyina izinkulungwane zamavolontiya nabasekeli abasisiza ukubhala isahluko esilandelayo sethemba.

projects.title: Izenzo Zethu
projects.subtitle: Thola izinhlelo eziguqukayo ezidala ushintsho oluhlala njalo emiphakathini yonke emhlabeni.

education.title: Imfundo Nokufunda
education.description: Ukwakha izisekelo zemfundo ezinika imiphakathi amandla ukuze ziphumelele futhi zikhule ngendlela esimeme.

environment.title: Ukulondolozwa Kwemvelo
environment.description: Ukuvikela nokubuyisela imvelo kuyilapho kufundiswa imiphakathi yasendaweni izindlela ezisimeme.

healthcare.title: Ezempilo Zomphakathi
healthcare.description: Ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezempilo ezibalulekile kanye nemfundo yezempilo emiphakathini engakasekelwa.

water.title: Ukufinyelela Amanzi Ahlanzekile
water.description: Ukwakha izinhlelo zamanzi ezisimeme nokufundisa ukongiwa kwamanzi.

blog.title: Izindaba Zakamuva
blog.subtitle: Hlala unolwazi ngezindaba zethu zakamuva zomthelela kanye nezindaba zomphakathi
blog.title: Hlala Unolwazi
blog.subtitle: Bhalisela incwadi yethu yezindaba ukuze uthole izibuyekezo zakamuva

information.title: Indawo Yolwazi
information.subtitle: Finyelela izinsiza, izindaba, kanye nemininingo mayelana nomsebenzi wethu nomthelela wethu

hero.subtitle: Sikhona ukusiza nokuphendula noma yimiphi imibuzo ongaba nayo

volunteer.title: Yiba Ivolontiya
volunteer.description: Joyina umphakathi wethu wamavolontiya enza umehluko

partner.title: Amathuba Obambiswano
partner.description: Hlola izindlela zokubambisana nathi ukuze uthole umthelela omkhulu

donate.title: Nikela
donate.subtitle: Ukwesekwa kwakho kusisiza sidale ushintsho oluhlala njalo emiphakathini yonke emhlabeni

hero.subtitle: Wonke umnikelo, noma ngabe mncane kangakanani, wenza umehluko wangempela

donate.monthly: Yenza lokhu kube umnikelo wanyanga zonke

impact.title: Umthelela Wakho
impact.25Description: Uhlinzeka ngezinto zokufunda zesikole ezinganeni ezi-5

why.title: Kungani Unikela Ku-BAOBAB HOPE?
why.item1: Ukungafihli lutho okungu-100% endleleni imali esetshenziswa ngayo
why.item3: Izixazululo ezisimeme ezidala ushintsho oluhlala njalo
